nodes.text: Chandrakant was the smaller of the two moons of the Core World of Chandrila, which was located in the Chandrila system of the Bormea sector. The moon, which was only a fraction of the size of its fellow moon Chandra, was covered in amber-colored gases that reflected a dull, golden light and were toxic to most species. The moon's name meant "counterpoint" in the Chandrilan language.

The fact that Chandrila had two moons was established by Coruscant and the Core Worlds, a 2002 reference book published by Wizards of the Coast, but it was not identified until the 2015 Star Wars Roleplaying expansion Strongholds of Resistance, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The Chandrila system, and therefore Chandrakant, was placed in grid square L-9 by The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
